body.p: On the public evening, February 14th at the Chaos Computer Club in Frankfurt, we want to celebrate the "I Love Free Software Day" ğŸ¥³. Everyone interested in the topic of Free Software is welcome to stop by and participate!
In addition to a small program of a few ğŸ“¢ Lightning Talks (5' lectures) and a ğŸ• Pizza Party, the evening should be used for discussions about Free Software.
